mapper.insert: insert into recent_history(recent_history_no, recent_history_keyword, recent_history_id) values(popular_history_seq.nextval, #{keyword}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select recent_history_keyword from ( select recent_history_keyword, max(recent_history_time) as latest_time from recent_history group by recent_history_keyword order by latest_time desc ) where rownum <= 5
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM recent_history WHERE recent_history_id = #{memberId} AND recent_history_keyword = #{keyword}
